name: ManualValidation
description: Pause deployment and wait for manual validation
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: validators
inputs.label: Manual Validators
inputs.helpMarkDown: Send a manual validation pending email to specific users (or groups). Only users with queue build permission can act on a manual validation.

inputs.name: instructions
inputs.label: Instructions
inputs.helpMarkDown: These instructions will be shown to the user for resuming or rejecting the manual validation. Based on these instructions the user will take an informed decision about this manual validation.

inputs.name: onTimeout
inputs.label: On timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reject or resume this manual validation automatically after it is pending for the specified timeout or 30 days, whichever is earlier.
